name: LightRGB
description:
Survival Bullet Hell Roguelite

Change the color of your light and weapons to maximize damage against colorful enemies, utilize your boost gauge to outmaneuver countless enemies and projectiles, and choose from more than 100 different powerups to form a unique build every run. LightRGB is the survival bullet hell roguelite that promises more control to the player than ever before!

Features:

  • Elements: Colored elemental system allows you to deal more damage to enemies with skilled play by choosing the correct type.
  • Weapons: More than ten different weapons that you can pick up during a run, each with their own playstyle.
  • Ultimates: Different Ultimate powerups with devastating effects.
  • Bosses: Three stages, each with challenging Boss battles. (For this demo, only one stage is available).
  • Luminosity: Luminosity meta-progression system allows you to strengthen your character after each run.
  • Colorblind-Friendly: The developer is colorblind too! Let me know if you have issues differentiating any colors in the game.

This game is the demo version of a  solo project that I have been working on since April 2022. I hope to release to Steam sometime before the end of 2022. Any feedback is appreciated and I hope you enjoy the game!

Warning: This game contains many flashing, bright lights and colors that may cause discomfort and/or seizures for those with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.
